content: Can we please dispense with the fiction that this is a healthcare bill? It is not. It is nothing more than a hodgepodge of extreme right wing ideologues’ pet policies that they have thrown together and falsely labeled. Like yet another huge transfer of wealth from the bottom and middle to the top, defunding Planned Parenthood, crippling Medicaid, killing the poor, and other assorted right wing extremist wishes. It is not healthcare in any sense of the word and the media does a great disservice calling it such.
